name: SimpleTsuri
description:
Overview

SimpleTsuri is a simple fishing game made for a purpose of learning the PICO8 architecture. 

Press Z to cast your rod/dismiss a box/accept your selection.

Press X to switch to shop-inventory hybrid.

UP and DOWN selects your bait type or buy/sell option in shop-inventory.

LEFT and RIGHT moves your rod or selects an item in shop-inventory.

Features
  • simple story
  • rod throwing mechanics
  • shop which doubles as your inventory
  • grind
  • simple pixelart
  • Morrowind innuendo (singular)
Bugs

If you find any bugs, feel free to report them!
